EmailTemplate.name: Certification-Notification For the Channel Manager
EmailTemplate.subject: Notice to Dupont Channel Manager-New candidate nominated for Certification
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
DuPont Channel Manager {!Qualification__c.Channel_Manager__c},
This is a notification to inform you that {!Qualification__c.Account_Name__c} has been nominated for certification as a '{!Qualification__c.Certified_In_Area__c}' by {!Qualification__c.CreatedBy}. Please contact {!Qualification__c.CreatedBy} if you have any questions, otherwise no action is required. Click on this link to access the candidate profile.
Click on this link to View the Record
